title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; no API keys needed, runs entirely local.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping Ollama’s REST API; supports chat, generate, pull and list.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (text UI) for chatting with Ollama models inside your terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Camunda Community extension that exposes Ollama as a job worker for BPMN service tasks.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent facade and artisan commands to manage and query Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM power to any server using Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Lightweight VS Code extension that adds Ollama chat and code-generation panels.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that proxies and caches Ollama endpoints with rate-limiting.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Qt6; supports multiple concurrent chats.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama; async HTTP, SSE streaming, static binary compilation.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed APIs and CLI for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to integrate Ollama into mobile and desktop apps.
